plone.oofill Package Readme
=========================

Overview
--------

Uses the oofill python module to fill an odt document with data.
Those data are generated via browser views and TAL templates.


Usage
-----

See the README.txt in the package to know how to use it


Authors
-------

:atReal team - contact@atreal.net :
    Jean-Nicolas Bes (RIP)
    Matthias Broquet <tiazma>
